Package it.polimi.adaptanalyzertool.model

Class Architecture

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.adaptanalyzertool.model.Architecture
  • public class Architecture
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for the architecture object which defines the components used by the architecture.

    On this object are calculated all the architectures metrics found in ArchitectureMetrics.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Architecture​(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a new architecture with no components.
      Architecture​(java.lang.String name, java.util.Set<Component> components)
      Creates a new architecture with the specified set of components.
      Architecture​(java.lang.String name, java.util.Set<Component> components, java.util.Set<Workflow> workflows)
      Creates a new architecture with the specified set of components.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Architecture

        public Architecture​(java.lang.String name)
        Creates a new architecture with no components.

        Components can be added later with addComponent.

        Parameters:
        name - The name for this architecture.

      • Architecture

        public Architecture​(java.lang.String name,
                    java.util.Set<Component> components)
        Creates a new architecture with the specified set of components.

        More components can be added later by using addComponent.

        Parameters:
        name - The name for this architecture.
        components - The Set containing the components.

      • Architecture

        public Architecture​(java.lang.String name,
                    java.util.Set<Component> components,
                    java.util.Set<Workflow> workflows)
        Creates a new architecture with the specified set of components.

        More components can be added later by using addComponent.

        Parameters:
        name - The name for this architecture.
        components - The Set containing the components.
        workflows - The Set containing the workflows associated with this architecture.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of this architecture.
        Returns:
        The String containing the name of the architecture.

      • getComponents

        public java.util.Set<Component> getComponents()
        Gets all the components associated with the current architecture.
        Returns:
        an HashMap containing all the components related to this architecture.
        See Also:
        Component

      • getSingleComponent

        public Component getSingleComponent​(java.lang.String name)
        Searches for a component in this architecture. It returns null if the component is not found.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the component that has to be searched for.
        Returns:
        the component object if found, null otherwise.

      • getComponentsNames

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getComponentsNames()
        Returns a set of names that corresponds to all the component names.
        Returns:
        a set of string that corresponds to all the component names.

      • addComponent

        public void addComponent​(Component component)
        Adds a component to the architecture.

        No duplicates component can be added.

        Parameters:
        component - The Component to be added

      • addComponents

        public void addComponents​(java.util.Set<Component> components)

        Adds a set of components to this architecture.

        It uses the addComponent(Component) in a cycle to do so.

        Parameters:
        components - a set of components to be added to the architecture.

      • removeComponent

        public void removeComponent​(Component component)
        Removes a component from the current architecture.
        Parameters:
        component - The component to be removed.

      • removeAllComponents

        public void removeAllComponents()
        Removes all the component from the current architecture leaving it empty.

        The architecture is not destroyed by this operation.

      • getWorkflows

        public java.util.Set<Workflow> getWorkflows()
        Return the workflows associated with this architecture.
        Returns:
        the workflows associated with this architecture.
        See Also:
        Workflow

      • getWorkflowsNames

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getWorkflowsNames()
        Returns a set of names that corresponds to all the workflows names.
        Returns:
        a set of string that corresponds to all the workflows names.

      • getSingleWorkflow

        public Workflow getSingleWorkflow​(java.lang.String name)
        Searches for a workflow associated with this architecture. It returns null if the workflow is not found.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the workflow that has to be searched for.
        Returns:
        the workflow object if found, null otherwise.

      • addWorkflow

        public void addWorkflow​(Workflow workflow)
        Adds a workflows to the list of workflows associated with this architecture.
        Parameters:
        workflow - the workflows to be added.

      • removeWorkflow

        public void removeWorkflow​(Workflow workflow)
        Removes a workflows from the list of workflows associated with this architecture.
        Parameters:
        workflow - the workflows to remove from the list.

      • removeAllWorkflow

        public void removeAllWorkflow()
        Removes all workflows from the current architecture.

      • clone

        public Architecture clone​(java.lang.String name)

        This methods clones an architecture without carrying the workflows associated to it.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the cloned component.
        Returns:
        a copy of this object without workflows.
